body: Introduction to discrete-time signal processing: sampling, linear time- invariant systems, discrete-time Fourier transform and discrete Fourier transform, Z transform.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: NONE)(Additional Attributes: Honors)

title: EE 351H: Discrete-Time Linear Systems
